timeline.message:
Enable SonarCloud code scanning

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

Enable SonarCloud code scanning

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: Does this line need to be here or is it a dupe of line 77?
timeline.author: Nana-EC
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -151,6 +158,7 @@
                         <!-- Jacoco prepare-agent builds some command-line params without -->
                         <!-- which jacoco will not instrument. Hence it is important to add -->
                         <!-- those command-line params here (${argLine} holds those params) -->
+                        <!--suppress UnresolvedMavenProperty -->

replies.bodyText: It's not a dupe, it suppresses warnings in intellij about the line that follows it.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: nit: better yet a comment here saying "point to directory where sonar can import jacoco calculated coverage report from"
timeline.author: Nana-EC
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,7 +74,13 @@
         <protobuf.version>3.13.0</protobuf.version>
         <release.version>${project.version}</release.version> <!-- Used to replace release versions in all files -->
         <release.chartVersion>0.9.0-rc1</release.chartVersion>
-        <embedded.testcontainers.version>1.85</embedded.testcontainers.version>
+        <!--suppress UnresolvedMavenProperty -->
+        <sonar.coverage.jacoco.xmlReportPaths>

replies.bodyText: This isn't a descriptive comment, it's a programmatic comment to tell intellij the next line is not an error.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: I wasn't referring to the suppress in this case, I meant it might be useful to comment on the sonar jacoco relation
replies.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: I don't see how sonar.coverage.jacoco.xmlReportPaths could be unclear? It contains every keyword in your example description.
replies.author: steven-sheehy
